content:
```text
EXISTING STRUCTURES
###Copper plate mine at position(-22.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (-22.0, -50.0) and a chest at position (-21.5, -48.5)

###Iron plate smelting at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-14.5, -51.5) that puts coal into the furnace
- Chest at position (-14.5, -52.5) that stores iron plates
- Burner inserter at position (-14.5, -51.5) that puts iron plates into the chest

###Transport belt system
Consists of following entities
- Transport belts from (-19.5 y=-46.5) to (x=-14.5 y=-47.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-18.5, -48.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-19.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -49.5)

ERROR TIPS
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
- Make sure the inserter has enough space to insert all the items. Check the inventory of the inserter before inserting items

NAMESPACE
```
